sentences.en: A friendly intercourse is opened between the most remote parts of the world.
sentences.cn: 相距极远的两国开始了一种亲睦的邦交.

sentences.en: Administrators have their own methods of social intercourse.
sentences.cn: 办行政的人有他们的社交方式.

sentences.en: Airplanes, good roads, and telephones make intercourse with different parts of the country far easier than it was 50 years ago.
sentences.cn: 飞机, 良好的道路和电话使国内各地的交通较五十年前远为便利.

sentences.en: Don't intercourse with that kind of man, this is beneath you.
sentences.cn: 不要同那种人交往, 这有失你的身份.

sentences.en: English is more widely used in international intercourse than any other languages today.
sentences.cn: 现今英语在国际交往中比其他任何语言用得都广.

sentences.en: Her constant intercourse in a foreign tongue had worn away the nuances of speech.
sentences.cn: 经年累月使用外语和人交往使得她把语言的细微差别都消磨殆尽了.

sentences.en: I could imagine nothing in our intercourse that should justify formality of registration.
sentences.cn: 我想象不出我们之间有什么话要郑重其事地用挂号信来传送.

sentences.en: I endured last night and this morning a sermon about my intercourse with you.
sentences.cn: 关于我和你交往的事,昨晚和今天早上我都挨了一场训诫.

sentences.en: Judith had imparted some of her own skill in the toilet, during their short intercourse.
sentences.cn: 尤蒂丝在她们短短的谈话中把自己对于打扮的一些心得传给了她.

sentences.en: Our intercourse is at an end.
Tangles like this still interrupted their intercourse.
sentences.cn: 像这类纠缠不清的误会仍然妨碍着他们的交情.

sentences.en: The note is the most commonly used form of written communication in diplomatic intercourse.
sentences.cn: 照会是在外交交往中最常用的文书形式.

sentences.en: There was a reviving pleasure in this intercourse.
sentences.cn: 交谈中,有一种令人振奋的乐趣.

sentences.en: There was close intercourse between them.
There was little intercourse with the Parsonage.
sentences.cn: 他们和牧师公馆已不怎么来往.

words.tran_cn: 互相来往，交流；各教派间举行的圣餐
相通，互相联络；互相交往

trans.tran_en: an exchange of ideas, feelings etc which make people or groups understand each other better
